Reason: The configuration option 'periodic_commitlog_sync_lag_block_in_ms' is performance-sensitive. This is because the configuration directly impacts the write performance of the system by determining the number of milliseconds to block writes during slow disk flushes. The code related to this configuration involves time-expensive operations that can significantly affect the overall throughput of the system. Therefore, any changes to this configuration can lead to notable performance variations at the system level, making it performance-sensitive.
